title: Save the Goblin Sazza
content: at the makeshift prison of Druid Grove. (Persuasion or Intimidation checks) Allowing Arka to kill the caged goblin Sazza will break the paladin's oath of devotion. Talk to Sazza, and learn the information of a Priestess. Sazza agrees to lead you to that priestess if you managed to free her from the prison. Now you need to escort Sazza out of Grove. Near the makeshift prison, there's a platform you can jump on. Succeed in perception check will reveal a hidden door, which leads to Underground Pas
